ygData.subject: Re: Rogues vs. Tyreal/Nightmare's advent
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael was even more astonished. Tyrael: Has she said something else? At that moment, Dreadplague entered in the conversation. Dreadplague: I asked him to tell

Tyrael was even more astonished.

Tyrael: Has she said something else?

At that moment, Dreadplague entered in the conversation.

Dreadplague: I asked him to tell me where you are, but I think he is
too loyal to you to disobey your orders. I need to talk to you... now.

Tyrael: I have to tell you that I am in a battle right now.

Dreadplague: My point still stands.

He sighed.

Tyrael: Very well. I'm sending my coordinates. But I warn you, I will
not stand your whim very often.

Dreadplague: It is a very exceptionnal occasion, father. I must show
you something. I will be there in a few cycles. Dreadplague out.

She ran out the base and transformed to her first mode, a huge black
wyvern. She was soon airborne and proceeded quickly to rejoin her father.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : : 
> Darkangel(via commlink): Yes. She has referred to you by name, and
has called you her father. 
>  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Tyrael
was puzzled. His daughter?
> 
> Tyrael: Well... I huh... I'm glad she's doing fine. She says she
knows me?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Darkangel : :
> > Darkangel(via commlink): Yes, the Transformer is online, and has
> asked for you by name. She says she is your daughter, Dreadplague.
> >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:Tyrael
> received both Noir's missiles and was propelled far under the
> > passing shots of Riekan and Fury. He maintained a strong shield of
> > light as he did not want to get involved now.
> > 
> > Tyrael: I get you, Darkangel. Has our new warrior been activated?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Noir, back in jet mode, appears above Tyreal, launching a pair of 
> > > missiles at him.
> > > 
> > > Riekan pops up to one side, firing his explosive harpoons.
> > > 
> > > And finally, Fury strikes from behind with his cybervenom gun.
> >
